xwikidoc.title: Web servers test: Servlet Mapping
xwikidoc.content:
{{info}}**Question:** What configuration file usualy contains the servlet mapping in a java web server?
1. robots.txt 1. hibernate.cfg.xml 1. servlets.xml 1. web.xml 1. web.cfg 1. portlet.properties 1. portlet.xml{{/info}}
